jp.kobe_u.sugar.converter

Class Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.kobe_u.sugar.converter.Converter

  • public class Converter
extends java.lang.Object
    Converter class is used to convert input expressions to a CSP.
    See Also:
    Expression, CSP
